attributes.action: Allow Decent People To Protect Themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, in our own homes we have few rights to defend ourselves should someone break in. We suggest that the law be changed in favour of the home owner AND legalise the home use of non lethal defense items. The items considered should be Taser, CS/Pepper sprays and any other easy use non lethal  weapons.

The self protection items should ONLY be allowed for use in a private residence. Against an uninvited person or a person who is now not welcome and is refusing to leave and where the owner feels threatened.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
